tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE borrower_ratings (borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, repayment_history INT, financial_stability INT);
CREATE TABLE repayment_history (repayment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, borrower_id INT, amount_paid DECIMAL, payment_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Borrowers ( borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY, borrower_name TEXT, repayment_history TEXT, financial_stability TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Ratings ( rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY, borrower_id INT, rating DOUBLE, date_issued DATE );
CREATE TABLE Reviews ( review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, borrower_id INT, reviewer_name TEXT, review_text TEXT, date_reviewed DATE );

CREATE TABLE rating_history (
  rating_history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_id UUID REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
  previous_rating_value INT NOT NULL,
  current_rating_value INT NOT NULL,
  rating_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
  financial_data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  borrower_id UUID REFERENCES borrowers(borrower_id),
  income DECIMAL(15, 2),
  expenses DECIMAL(15, 2),
  savings DECIMAL(15, 2)
);
